description.value: You know the @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.spells-cantrips.Q31B0A3FNPWP10MQ]{Prying Whispers} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-1.DR1S6TA7ZZHXVKVY]{Menacing Visage} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-2.A0XHQ6VS7PDGN9FJ]{Cloak} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Presence is your spellcasting attribute for it (chosen when you select this race).
